item.description: This Saturday the 27th The Wine ConneXtion is hosting a free tasting event with over 50 wines and a food tasting from Chama Grill. It's their biggest event of the year and they open up every part of the store so they can pour as much wine as possible. There is no RSVP requirement, just show up ready to try some wine!

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Wine Tasting at The Wine ConneXtion
